question: The "Lake Enriquillo" is located in which country?
explanation: The Lake Enriquillo is located in the island country of the Dominican Republic in the Hispaniola Islands of the Greater Antilles Archipelago in the West Indies-Caribbean region. This lake is the largest lake in the Dominican Republic, Hispaniola Island and Caribbean region. This lake is the lowest point of the Dominican Republic. This lake is a saline lake in which Yaque del Sur river forms its primary inflow. It is a Ramsar Wetland. This lake is home to the largest population of American crocodiles in the Caribbean.
